mapper.insert: insert into zl ( id, email, che_num, starttime) values (#{id}, #{email}, #{chenum}, #{starttime})
mapper.select: select zl.id, zl.email, zl.che_num, zl.starttime,che.price from zl left join che on zl.che_num=che.che_num where zl.email=#{email}
select zl.id, zl.email, zl.che_num, zl.starttime,che.price from zl left join che on zl.che_num=che.che_num
